name: War Identity
description:
War Identity is a competitive first person shooter The game started off with a chaotic events with protests, virus and a nuclear catastrophe between all countries. The game takes place in modern day handling the events that could possibly occur. The battle is between Survivalists vs UMSC. A war broke out for survival, society trust levels are lower than ever. Join in on some action with this free to play FPS game.

War Identity is free to play. Updated weekly with new features and improvements.

Multiplayer (6v6) has the following game modes:

  • Team Deathmatch
  • Free for All
  • Capture the Flag
  • Last Man Standing
  • Domination

Some features of the game:

  • 35 Weapons
  • Gun Customization
  • 4 Weapon Loadout Slots
  • Experience System with 112 Levels
  • Clans
  • Ammo Care Package
  • Killstreaks
  • Mini-map/HUD
  • Token Store
  • 11 Maps
  • 20 Unlockable Characters
  • 50+ Weapon Camos
  • 50+ Dances
  • Emotes
  • Loot Boxes
  • Earned Stamina Attribute Per Character
  • Competitive Modes
  • Leaning
  • Lefty Mode
  • Battle Pass
  • Steam Friends

Current Roadmap:

  • Zombies Hoard Mode (80% completed)
  • Battle Royale Mode (10% completed)
  • New killstreaks (0% completed)
  • Inventory/Backpack (0% completed)
  • Perks for inventory (0% completed)
  • Twitch voting game bonuses (40% completed)
  • Stun, flash & smoke grenades (0% completed)
